title: Alternate Battle #10?
content:
I'm not sure if it's my place to do this, but in lieu of anybody posting battle #10 (and here it is Wednesday morning,) might I propose the following challenge?

Requirements:

- Size: 600 width x 400 height. 72 dpi  
- Color: Black and white only  
- Format: Please save your graphics as PNG  
- Only respond with the characters posted in the challenge.

// THIS WEEK’S CHALLENGE:  
Pick one character and design it for at least four widths and at least four weights. This should give you at least 16 members of a family. Post the results.
author: jazzsammich

comments.content: Jazz you should email Christian with this.
